statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.Option1Type , AA.Option1Name , AA.Option1Value , AA.Option2Type , AA.Option2Name , AA.Option2Value
FROM dbo.TScrapOption AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.Name = #Name#
AND AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapOption WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapOption WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Name = #Name#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapOption ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, Option1Type, Option1Name, Option1Value, Option2Type, Option2Name, Option2Value ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #Option1Type#, #Option1Name#, #Option1Value#, #Option2Type#, #Option2Name#, #Option2Value# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TScrapOption SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , Option1Type = #Option1Type# , Option1Name = #Option1Name# , Option1Value = #Option1Value# , Option2Type = #Option2Type# , Option2Name = #Option2Name# , Option2Value = #Option2Value# WHERE ID = #ID#
